changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Vous Devez absolument reconfigurer l'équ: You absolutely have to reconfigure the equipment to indicate your latitude / longitude instead of the city
changelog.md.Nouvelle présentation de la liste des ob: New presentation of the list of objects
changelog.md.Correction de bug sur le déclenchement d: Bug fix on sunrise / sunset trigger
changelog.md.Correction de bug des widgets en v4: Bug fix for widgets in v4

index.md.permet de récupérer les données météorol: allows you to retrieve meteorological data from one or more cities
index.md.Il donne accès, entre autre, aux prévisi: It gives access, among other things, to weather forecasts, information on sunrise and sunset, temperature, humidity, wind, etc. The information comes from the website
index.md.Vous retrouvez ici la configuration de v: Here you find the configuration of your equipment
index.md.rend votre équipement visible sur le das: makes your equipment visible on the dashboard
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.Latitude de l'endroit ou vous voulez la: Latitude of the place where you want the weather (in the form
index.md.Longitude de l'endroit ou vous voulez la: Longitude of the place where you want the weather (in the form
index.md.permet d'afficher toutes les information: displays all weather information or not on mobile
index.md.pour afficher des images à la place des: to display images instead of icons on the widget
index.md.vous retrouvez toutes les commandes disp: you will find all the available commands as well as the possibility of logging or not the numerical values
index.md.Le code (numéro) en fonction des conditi: The code (number) according to the conditions can be consulted
index.md.Le rafraîchissement des données météo s': The weather data is refreshed every 30 minutes
index.md.OpenWeather fournit une liste d'informat: OpenWeather provides a list of information for the next 120 hours; therefore, based on the current time, we only know part of the information on D + 4
index.md.Ainsi, cette prédiction à J+4 s'affine p: Thus, this prediction on D + 4 is refined to become more precise as the current day progresses
index.md.Pour cette raison, certaines information: For this reason, certain information, such as the MAX temperature reached on D + 4 can only make sense at the end of the day
